title: Best bank ever
text:
Guys, if you‚Äôre sick of the traditional big banks you need to try Monzo.  I‚Äôve been banking with them for over a year now and if I have a question their online chat is always there to help me. 
If you travel you want their card.  No international transaction fees and each foreign transaction is charged at the mid-market exchange rate. No arbitrage or hidden fees.  
This needs to be your bank.

title: Needs better support
text:
This bank is nice. The app itself is pretty nice. I like the features that comes with it. No problems in that department. The main issue is communication with customer service and getting access to your account again. I‚Äôve been having issues logging in because I don‚Äôt have access to my email account. In my opinion that should be a top priority as well as other things. It has taken me since March 23rd (it‚Äôs now April 1st) to get things in motion. The first time I reached out, they never responded back. After repeatedly sending them the information they‚Äôve requested‚Ä¶Finally after going back and forth for 24 hours and being ‚Äútransferred ‚Äú to another specialist, they let me know to contact US support. LOL. So that‚Äôs the part I‚Äôm at. Emailing the ‚ÄúUS‚Äù support team and starting over. So hopefully it doesn‚Äôt take a week for them to update my email address so I can log into my account.

**Update** they closed my account. I jumped through hoops just to have my account closed lol. Hopefully they don‚Äôt take months to give me my funds in my account. 

Just a note: add another way to verify your account! Add a pass phrase or give your users another option with using their verified phone number to get the access code! That should help things run more efficiently.

title: Amazing Customer Service and Fraud Dept.!
text: After using this Monzo app for one account as a trial run, I‚Äôm ready to move all of my accounts over from a big bank that I‚Äôve been with for a long time. The response time and customer focused app is refreshing and much appreciated. They really make you feel like they care!

title: This is a poor choice for a prepaid bank
text: I want to start this review with the first day I join Monzo. Period. A friend of mine had sent me a link an invitation as you will and it had an incentive for sign up I‚Äôll sign up and get five dollars once you receive your card and activated or something like that I can‚Äôt remember the requirements exactly but it was nothing big I want to receive my garden met all the requirements after a little while I contacted customer support and Ashely what happened at that time they informed me that the sign-up bonuses and referral program was only for their British customers even though inside the app there is a referral button at the top left-hand corner that has a gift package on it and really kind of makes you think why is that there if I‚Äôm not allowed to use it but that‚Äôs not the reason for this poor review approximately 26 days ago at this time I was stayed in a hotel that required me to give him a $50 deposit so I‚Äôd left him that deposit on my Monzo card my deposit was released by the hotel two days later I didn‚Äôt know that though so after about 15 days I contacted Monzo and ask them hey where is my money they said oh the hotel hasn‚Äôt released it so then I called the hotel and hotel says yes we released it on the 28th so then I called Monzo and they said no they haven‚Äôt released it we promise so then I called the payment processing company, shift four, myself and I got a hold of the technical support team and the payment support team both of which assured me that there is no hold on my card they sent over the proper documentation to prove that and that my money had been released two weeks prior to that‚Ä¶ Now the first time I contacted Monzo and asked about my money being released they told me it either has to wait 30 days for it to fall off or for the hotel to release it or if you can get us a letter from the merchant or the payment processing system saying that the money was released we will go ahead and manually release it for you so I did all of that I provided him every single thing they asked for it and once I did that they said never mind we‚Äôre gonna hold your money for the full 30 days well Manzo you aren‚Äôt emergent you have no right to my money and you are withholding money from me. And I understand why because once you realize there was no hold on it and y‚Äôall have been too lazy to check it the only way you can possibly back your own stupid play is to just play it off and let it run the timer out in the 30 days you know sometimes it‚Äôs better in life just to own up to your mistakes say we‚Äôre sorry here‚Äôs your money back

title: Lots of potential
text: I like the instant funding option - very convenient. Setting certain transactions as repeating payments is a very nice feature for subscriptions and under the ‚ÄúPayments‚Äù tab you can see these recurring payments. I like that you can add notes, tags and receipts to every transaction. The budgeting tool is not very helpful to me personally, but the Trends feature is - it helps to see how you‚Äôre using your money. The Pots have a ‚Äúscheduled payments‚Äù option, but it should really say ‚Äúscheduled transfers‚Äù because Pots are not for making payments - they are just to set money aside. To use money from Pots you have to transfer it back to main account. If I could make payments directly from a ‚ÄúBills‚Äù Pot with its own account number then ‚Äúscheduled payments‚Äù would make sense and would be a very useful feature. Spend (checking), Savings and Bills - if I had a separate account number for these three along with some cash back or rewards options on purchases, it would be the perfect banking app for me. This app has a lot of potential.

title: Best neobank since Simple was shutdown by the piranhas
text: Monzo USA is the best neobank since Simple Bank was shutdown by the piranhas. I have opened accounts with One, Envel, Discover, BBVA, PNC and CFCU and none come remotely close to offering the features Simple had, except Monzo USA. That said, the lack of access from a standard PC, except for the bare essential and feature limited (read nonexistent) emergency browser, is a major limiter and prevents me from using Monzo for all my finances as I was able to with Simple Bank. As such, I use Monzo daily while at the same time searching monthly for a replacement nenobank that has all the features Simple Bank offered before being shutdown.

title: Don‚Äôt bother if you‚Äôre visiting the UK
text: The app will take all of your personal information, 48 hours of your time, and then reject you without recourse. Despite what they say, even if you have a UK address, you will be rejected.

title: No support for Plaid
text:
As someone who uses Copilot budgeting app, Plaid support is crucial and how my local credit union can have support for Plaid, but a fintech company like Monzo not, is beyond me. I‚Äôve been using Monzo for the past two months as my primary bank and not being able to use my budgeting app of choice is incredibly frustrating. What worse is that on Monzo‚Äôs development roadmap, Plaid support falls low on the list and it doesn‚Äôt seem to be a priority at all. Granted, Monzo has built in budgeting tools, but they pale in comparison to something like Copilot. So while I‚Äôm not going to close my account, I will switch back to my credit union in the mean time. 
Aside that, the app has a nice interface and the pots feature is quite nice as well.

title: Do not get Monzo
text:
This is the worst App I‚Äôve  ever had I had $80 in my Monzo account and then they close my account they told me they sent my money to my other bank account but then I contacted my other bank because I never got it and they told me they sent it and now when I contacted and got a hold of Manzo they said I had an overdraft fee of like $100 to my other bank account which I knew and I was not paid off when I got paid the $80 with my emergency fund money but little did I know Mondo a claims that they paid off $80 on my debt 
After they told me they sent it to my other bank account which has nothing to do with it so they pretty much messed me up with my grocery money which was $80 until the 11th when I got paid so now me and my son don‚Äôt have money for grocery‚Äôs till the 11th  because of them and they never sent me an email or called me letting me know that they supposedly were going to pay off my other bank account so they Took my money without contacting me and I can‚Äôt get into my other bank account at the moment so I don‚Äôt even know if they really did pay the $80

title: Account Frozen
text:
I have only been Banking with Monzo Bank for a week and so far my experience with 
Monzo has been nothing but a complete nightmare my account was operating and functioning probably on every level until i placed my money into there Bank immediately when i needed access to pay a bill myMonzo account doesn't work it's frozen i then contact there customer service support by phone with no Representative's to assist me only a recorded message instructing me to leave a message on there app. I then voiced my concerns regarding my account on there app with a vague useless response similar to a bot and now several days later and still has not been resolved. I am currently unable to have my surgery for my impacted wisdom tooth that has now escalated to an infection in my mouth because all my assists are frozen and i can't provide the payment to have my surgery completed this has not only wrecked havoc on my health it is causing a financial hardship.

title: No way to contact help
text: My wife and I moved to the UK. Someone recommended Monzo because getting a bank account here is difficult for immigrants. So we did. Wife got her card but I‚Äôm still waiting as it‚Äôs late. No way to contact Monzo in the app because it just lets me see an activate card page. Guess I can‚Äôt get paid now because Monzo won‚Äôt let you have a joint account without a personal one. We are trying to create a Barclays account instead but their earliest appointments are weeks out. Man I miss the US...

title: Love this bank!
text:
Monzo (USA customer) is absolutely wonderful, I‚Äôm so happy I found it!!

I hate how overly complex most banking apps are - too much noise, notifications, etc. I know myself, for me, less is more when it comes to my finances. Monzo is simple. No fees, no hoopla. I love their salary sorter. I can quickly sort my money into Pots - it‚Äôs very set it and forget it. Monzo is my absolute favorite bank!

They also has great customer support. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had a positive online chat experience in my life, but their chat team was superb!

I went through the application, but unfortunately they rejected it. It gave no explanation as to why my application was rejected, and they also gave no opportunity for me to reapply since I was thinking maybe I incorrectly input some information. Oh well.

title: Great to use internationally
text:
I find the US Monzo account limited with its offerings BUT on my first trip after COVID-19 I used it all throughout Europe and it is FANTASTIC! 

There are NO international MasterCard fees and they give you a reasonable exchange rate. When you pay, choose ‚ÄúUSD‚Äù not the local currency and Monzo does the exchange. 

I love the fact it breaks down the purchases into categories. 

Also, Europe is notorious for ATM card skimming. By keeping a lower balance on my Monzo I limit my risk. I also use it instead of my regular bank card for cash withdrawals. 

I must say I like it and it‚Äôs practically the only card I use. Would love to see them do a Credit Card like Chime as you need a CC for many airlines and hotels

App is recommended

title: Avoid. Awful service
text: I signed up for an account, and they sent my card to the wrong address. That‚Äôs where it all went downhill. Where most banks would have someone you could speak with quickly to update and re-send, they don‚Äôt have that option. You need to use the app‚Äôs chat function. It took 3 days for someone to respond to my initial message, but apparently the issue was too difficult for that agent, so they needed a ‚Äúspecialist‚Äù to get involved. More than two weeks later waiting for someone to get back to me and multiple ‚Äúwe‚Äôre so sorry, we guarantee a specialist will get back to you ASAP,‚Äù I asked them to close my account. They assured me again it would be resolved quickly, but there was nothing they could do in the meantime. After 3 weeks from my application, I received an email from someone called Eugene telling me that not only did they close my account, but I will never be allowed to open an account with them again? Updating an address for a client is a basic task for any bank. For this company, it may get you banned.

title: Awful service
text: They would not let me open an account when their app is not capable of uploading two images for identity verification for me to upload my passport photo page and extension on the second page. Due to this they could only see the expired date on my photo page and could not see the passport‚Äôs extension printed on the second page as my country only does extensions. I emailed them a scan of both pages and after telling me thanks for the copy of both pages and that it would not be a problem setting up my account spent 3 weeks being with no one helping to open my account with the emailed documentation as everything is done in app. In app customer service reps could not do anything and have sort of power whatsoever in resolving anything and could not open my account as they could probably only see the one image that is able to uploaded within the app. Horrible customer service and either the app needs full functionality or a website needs to be launched to avoid future problems. Found it most annoying that when I called they reassured me that I could definitely open an account with the emailed documents they received but actually did not and I still to this day cannot open an account with my valid identity verification document.

title: Latest version has a serious glitch. They don‚Äôt have an answer
text:
I had a friend try to install and open an account. The app attempts to launch then closes. It won‚Äôt open and he can initiate an account. I‚Äôve read online about this issue as well. Some say they can‚Äôt access their account as a result. I‚Äôm concerned this may happen with my account if it updates. I‚Äôve contacted monzo support via their chat which is frustrating as they answer every once in a while then go dark for hours after asking a question. 

Their latest response is:

‚ÄúHi Xxx, I'm so sorry for the delay here.
Are you all still having issues here? I don't believe this is something we have control over.‚Äù

Really?  It‚Äôs your app!  It‚Äôs not the brand new model iPhone with the latest iOS!

Anyway I‚Äôd highly recommend being careful at this point. Sadly. Because I was really fond of monzo

title: Best bank and app
text: Monzo is simply the best banking app I ever used. Fast, intuitive, robust. It‚Äôs very easy to get an overview of your spending and send/receive money. You can even split bills with your Monzo friends in seconds. Also you get instant push notifications on every transaction, both in and out.
